data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Potentially Leaked
data.Description: A potential leak of Google's search algorithm code and API documentation has sparked speculation about how the algorithm ranks websites, with insights into SEO metrics and ranking factors.

data.Title: Plano Police Warn of SEO Scams
data.Description: The Plano Police Department has issued a warning about scammers using search engine optimization (SEO) techniques to manipulate search results and direct users to fraudulent websites impersonating legitimate brands.

data.Title: Google Tests New Ad Formats and Features
data.Description: Google is experimenting with various new ad formats and features, including larger font sizes for main title links, descriptions and labels on photos in local business profiles, and a new format for call and location extensions.

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 to Update Attribution Model
data.Description: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) will be updated to improve its attribution model, allowing for more accurate tracking of conversions attributed to paid search campaigns.

data.Title: Google Advises Against Crawling Action URLs
data.Description: Google recommends website owners to prevent Googlebot from crawling action URLs, such as "buy," "add to cart," and "subscribe," to optimize website crawling and indexing.

data.Title: Bing Tests Black Review Stars
data.Description: Bing Search is experimenting with using black-colored stars for reviews in its search results, potentially impacting user experience and perception of ratings.

data.Title: OpenAI Explores For-Profit Model
data.Description: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, has informed investors about the company's consideration of transitioning to a for-profit benefit corporation, potentially paving the way for an IPO.

data.Title: Meta Pauses AI Model Launch in Europe
data.Description: Meta has postponed the launch of its AI models in Europe following a request from the Irish Data Protection Commission (DPC), which raised concerns about the use of personal data for training.

data.Title: Yahoo News App Gets AI-Powered Revamp
data.Description: Yahoo has released a redesigned Yahoo News app, integrating AI technology from Artifact, a news app acquired from Instagram's co-founders, aiming to enhance user experience and content recommendations.

data.Title: The Trade Desk and Yahoo in Trading Dispute
data.Description: The Trade Desk and Yahoo are engaged in a trading dispute that could lead to The Trade Desk, a major independent demand-side platform (DSP), cutting off access to Yahoo's video inventory.

data.Title: Goodway Group Conducts Layoffs
data.Description: Digital media agency Goodway Group has been gradually laying off employees across various teams as part of an ongoing workforce reduction.

data.Title: Michael Kors Adopts Mastercard's AI Shopping Assistant
data.Description: Michael Kors has become the first retailer to implement Mastercard's AI-powered shopping assistant, "The Shopping Muse," which provides personalized recommendations to enhance the online shopping experience.
